pageContext.claim: “'These guys, the investigators, ought to be in jail. What they have done, working with the Obama intelligence agencies, is simply unprecedented. This is one of the greatest political hoaxes ever perpetrated on the people of this Country, and Mueller is a coverup.' Rush Limbaugh”
pageContext.analysis: Trump quotes Rush Limbaugh, suggesting he endorses the idea that FBI and Justice Department investigators should be arrested and that an investigation that has yielded numerous guilty pleas and indictments is nothing more than a political hoax.
